hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Transition via Macro Catalyst Alignment
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC consolidates in NEUTRAL regime between 0.9-1.1x 200-day SMA for 15+ days, a breakout above consolidation high on >50% volume spike coinciding with positive crypto-specific regulatory news (FCA clarity, ETF inflow) triggers BULL regime within 7 days with 85% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended neutral consolidation near long-term SMA represents equilibrium. Breakout with volume + fundamental catalyst suggests sustainable trend change. Low Fear & Greed prevents buying exhaustion. Regulatory clarity reduces systemic risk premium.
entry_conditions: Daily close above 15-day consolidation range high
Positive regulatory catalyst (FCA, MiCA implementation clarity, ETF net inflows >$200M)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Regime shifts to BULL (confidence > 70%) OR BTC gains 12% from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price falls back into consolidation range (below breakout level)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakouts with these conditions fail to produce BULL regime >30% of time OR average gains <5% before reversal.
